Posts.Content: Jtaylor88 wrote: Hi everyone, my names Jill and I am just wondering if there is anyone who would be willing to fill out a simple 10 question survey. I am a senior at Paul Smith's college and this is to complete my senior thesis for graduation. I am doing a simply study on the diets of chemotherapy patients. My end result is to hopefully create a sort of meal plan based on the likes and dislikes of patiens, as well as their nutritional need. This thesis was inspired by my dear aunt who is currently undergoing chemotherapy (and has been for three years now) for colon cancer, as well as my godfather who sadly passed away due to stomach cancer. if anyone is able and willing to fill out this survey I would greatly appriciate it, it will only take a few minutes! If not I completely understand and appriciate your time. Thank you all. Below is the link for the survey. Again, thank you for your time! www.surveymonkey.com/s/RLZMW9W Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Jtaylor88 wrote: Hello everyone, my name is Jill and I am just wondering if there is anyone who would be willin to fill out a simply 10 question survey. I am a senior at Paul Smith College in upstate New York and the survey is to complete my senior thesis to graduate. The thesis is a study on the diets of chemotherapy patients, with a main focus on those affect by breat and prostate cancer. My end result is to hopefully create a sort of meal plan based on the likes and dislikes of patients, as well as their nutritional needs. This thesis was inspired by my aunt who is has been undergoing chemotherapy for three years now for colon cancer, as well as my godfather who sadly passed away due to prostate cancer four years ago. If anyone is willing and able to answer this simply survey I would greatly appriciate it, but if not I understand and thank you for you time! Below is the link for the survey. Again thank you for your time and have a wonderful day! www.surveymonkey.com/s/RLZMW9W Log in to post a reply
